resources.string: Do you know the name of this famous parisian dish that is also named after the animal cooked in it?
Select all the items you would need on a pic-nique and place them in the basket!
Drag and drop all of the ingredients for a delicious Onion Soup in the pan!\nBeware, if you make 3 errors I\'ll have to take someone else...
Listen to this part of La Marseillaise (the French Anthem) and drag and drop the right missing words in the blank space!
